:) HI! It seems it's your first time using Language Database. This is a basic language app, where you can store and practice with your own vocabulary by creating groups of words, adding info and testing it. 
 
 let's get started!! In order to make progress, you will have to maintain an equilibrium between adding words and making tests. Each word can have two states: acquired or not acquired. Whenever you correctly translate a word several times in different days,its status will change to "acquired" You will be able to perform tests by clicking the "T" option in the superior right part of the menu. Overall, you can not have more than 120 words in the "not acquired" form, and hence, you will have to simultaneously keep doing tests and adding words. When adding a new word, you wil have to fill out the fields "word" and "translation". You will also have the option to provide a definition and an example.  daily view Here you have all the added words on the group About the app Language Database (LDB) is an app that allows the user to store its own vocabulary lists and practise with it . Tests The app has a system of tests for which some words are randomly picked and the user has to provide the correct translation. If the answer is right, the word will not appear in the tests again for some days. When the user has repeatedly answered with the right translation, the word will be marked as acquired, 
 and it will no longer appear on the test. On top of that, it will appear with a grey color in the words list. Word groups: The structure of this app is similar to a notes app, with the difference that LDB handles the words using a database, and hence you can perform actions like sorting, filtering searching and editing words. Each added word will posses certain properties, like translation, definition, example and example translation. Those accessible by clicking on top of the word. Statistics On the top right menu of the main screen, you will find an statistics option where you can see the distribution of words per group, as well as how many are yet to be acquired. On top of that, you can also check the number of words added per day or month. Here you can see the added words. You already added 120 words, please make some tests in order to acquire them.
